data.name: ROT 13 Decode/encode
data.description:
```Please note that for the duration of this super important and possibly lethal mission you are restricted to using lambda functions (sorry folks) Ruby only. ```</br>
You are a secret spy on a super secrect mission doing some super secret stuff that super secret spies do in these super secret missions.</br>
Or </br>
```Lbh ner n frperg fcl ba n fhcre frperpg zvffvba qbvat fbzr fhcre frperg fghss gung fhcre frperg fcvrf qb va gurfr fhcre frperg zvffvbaf.```</br>
Hum what just happened..? </br>
`E` is used to denote the encoding function and `D` is used for decoding</br>
Your job is to create a ROT13 decoder and encoder (Yayyy)</br>
Python has code limit of 52 chars.</br>
JavaScript has code limit of 85 chars.</br>
Ruby has code limit of 40 chars. (C'mon its super easy in ruby)
